channel.title: How to publicly connect a 508, and let others play
channel.description:
What do i do so that people can connect to my port for a 508?
im new to the 508 scene. and i was wondering if i had to edit something like a gui.java and change the port inside of it
for 508's though im noticing when you log in it asks for your i.p would i just tell them to put in my i.p?
please anwser, future thanks to those who help me

item.title: How to publicly connect a 508, and let others play
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

Ummm, i can play my source, and i took no time at all to do anything to it. Im just new to 508 private servers. And needed to know if i have to change anything inside of my folders so when i compress my files, others can play.

So yeah, this source isnt ‘shitty’ its actually really good. So before coming out saying something and obviously not knowing what your talking about realize this. Knowone is going to listen to you. That is why you have 6 rep.

Read full topic
item.source: How to publicly connect a 508, and let others play

item.title: How to publicly connect a 508, and let others play
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

Ive searched “loader” under client files and didnt find anything, i even searched the source folder to find nothing.

Read full topic
item.source: How to publicly connect a 508, and let others play

item.title: How to publicly connect a 508, and let others play
item.dc:creator: @chance1234 chance1234
item.description:
@chance1234 wrote:

go into client files and look up “loader” and then open the file called loader. then look for “Class68_Sub20_Sub15.ip” change the ip to urs. then exit.save.compile.upload to mediafire. friend downloads u play hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: How to publicly connect a 508, and let others play
